info.title: Homebrew Menu
info.author: yellows8, plutoo
info.description: Run and load other Homebrew apps
info.details:
Homebrew Launcher for Switch!
Places hbmenu.nro on the root of your SD card.
See https://switchbrew.org/wiki/Homebrew_Menu for more usage instructions.
After the exploit, HBL is launched by visiting the Album from the home menu.

changelog:
3.5.1
Update theme.c by @octopuserectus in #169
Fix: Incomplete and Incorrect Russian Localization by @Vyacguru in #170
Fix build pc version on macOS by @Vyacguru in #174
use SDL2 for rendering on pc testbed by @WinterMute in #180
Added a warning for homebrew using an outdated ABI by @Adubbz in #183
